text: eya harima hurathal.
lakiya asuwe kopayeni.
ithin unta rata walapallata giyath ekayi, nathath ekayi, rata haduwath ekayi nathath ekayi.
madhyawalata kiyana katha witharayi.
udaya prasanna sahaya adhyakshawarayaya.
‘skayi‘ puwath sewaya samanga sammukha sakachchawakata ekwemin janadhipathiwaraya me bawa prakasha kaleya.
sab enakam hitapu filumak thamayi me…
pa padi sammelanaye hitapu sabhapathiwarayeku wana en.
nishan : ado monawada ban eewaye thiyenne?

ee hinda ee aakaraye pramithiyakata eyata aadala widiyata sathun athi karawima wani de karanawa misa ha ha harak mas epa kiyala ka guhuwata eeka me rate neweyi me loke kisima thanaka karanna puluwan deyak neweyi.
bala thulanayak nathikama .
adhikarana sanwidhana panatha: shri lanka nithignya sangamaye pethsamata erehiwa paminillak

enam siyawasakata wadi kalayak thisse kisidu nobel thyagayak lankikayakuta me dakwa himi wi nathath wikalpa nobel thyagaya namin da atham wita handinwena mema sammanaya pasugiya dashaka thuna thula thewarak lankikayanta pirinami thibimayi.
ema nisa mema mulashra thulin ekala pawathi krida pilibanda sruju sakshi yanthamin soya gena atha.
kese namuth thriwida hamudawa thawaduratath akhanda meheyumwala nirathawa sitina athara agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha me sambandhayen wishesha prakashayak sidu kara thibe.
balu puttu aathal eka iwara una gaman ibe galawila yanawaya.

mema blog satahana kisidu wanijamaya aramunakin thora wana athara hudek danuma beda ganima mulika aramunu kota aththeya.emenma kisidu awasthawaka mehi samaji wirodhi ho asabhya yayi samajaya piliganna kisidu karunak ho seyaruwak wath pala nokerena athara oonama awasthawaka kuda daruwakuta wuwada rasawindaya haki saha danuma thaba gatha haki ayurin satahan thanannata nibanda uthsaha ganne , mage satahane palamu rasa windinna mage biridath , mage diyaniwarun dedenath wana nisama pamanak nowe , eya samajiya yuthukamak se ma salakana heyini.emenma yam thakshanika gatalu wala balapama harennata mage “sundara sinhala bhashawa “danna pamana niwaradiwa hasurawannatath , nisi thanhi ingrisi pada bhawitha karannatath mama nibanda wehesemi .
habata uguduwa koyi wageda?
danata lokaye warnadeha sankhyawa wenaswima nisa wadi washayenma athiwana rogaya meya we.
oyage penuma niyamayi.
sama witama gettuwe dakunu kotasa mulin wiwrutha wimata yodanna.
meya galkisse weralata giye michchiyak ekkada danna
aarugambe elifant rok pradeshaye kalapuwa aasanna wana lahabakata giya ohu ehidi kimbaulata goduru wi aththe eeye (14) paswaru 3.30 ta pamanayi.
pitakotuwa bas nawathume di thaththa munagasunu wita koluwa thaththage ange elli ikigasamin handannata gaththeya.
obathuma tharam uthuru palathe janathawa gana hadawathin sithu jananayakayek sitiye natha.

enayin lal wikramathunga wisin karana lada prakashayaye wadagathkama athi wishala ya.(ese namuth pudamayakata men merata pradhana dharawe janamadhya mema prakashaya pasu pasa panna aththa soya ganimata thath daruwe natha.)
mama hithanawa eeka oyata watinawa athi kiyala......
uu thamayi wade dunne “ “ethakota kellage kata uththare thiyenne umbaath balahathkarayen eeki ekka hitiya kiyala?
ohomath trip yanawada .
kriyathmaka wanne obe rate nithiya nowe da?”
ehema thaththwayakayi ape sinamawa pawathinne.
sithiwili wala atharamanwa hididdi ohu galparaye kelawara un ma asalatama pamina sitiyeya.
dhanya warga sakasima
saukhyarakshitha poshyadayi aahara nirogi saha yaha pawathma udesa wadagath wanu atha.
wechcha siddiya mama ketiyen kiyannamko..
aayeth mata kiyanna oona une mechcharayi buwa ha mathalanta wada prathiba purna rachakayan thawa me blog wala inna bawath, maha wedanage prakashaya waradi bawath pamanayi.

bengali jathika aya amerika eksath janapadaye da, burumayeda (miyanmar) bhawana iganwu athara amerikawe saha yuropaye athiwu widarshana bhawana nambauruwata wishala dayakathwayak sapayu upasikawaka wuwaya (upatha 1925 marthu 11-abhawaya 1989 sapthambar).
kathikawath liyapadinchi kala yuthuda ?
ithin ee gamana toyoda nirmanakaruwanta nam samanya gamanak nemeyi.
math samanga me gamana giya wije mage pasal sagayek bawa mama mulin kiwa.
mata duka hamotama denda bari wechcha eka ganayi..
eeka kadima adahasak.
mahinda rajapaksha mahatha siya sohoyurawana basil rajapakshata erehiwa kisiwak nokaranu athi bawa watahaganimata ohuta nohakiwiya.
kamala das yanu hamawitama awankathwaya pilibanda pathala kirthiyak athi kiwindiyaki.
siayingi wartha pawa woharika warthawe thiyenawa.
sathara apayath, manushya lokaya, diwya loka hayawath, rupi brahma loka dasayath, arupi brahma loka hatharath.
oba obata ooni de issellama kiyala bila gewala badu laba ganna thiyenne.chit eka adala kenekta dunna gaman kama nam hambawenawa.
ema madhyasthana haputhale, ambaagasdowa, mahaoya saha padawiya yana pradesha wala pihita thibe.
dewani kotasedi sujith rathnayakage lipiya uputa dakwamin ee ganada ma katha kara thibenawa.
lokaye noindul swabhawika sampathwalin anun ratak washayen handunagena athi athara, erata thula nidan gathawa athi manik sampatha milakala nohaki watinakamin yuth bawa me wana wita soyagena atha.
ewani awasthawakadi prathijiwaka aushadha labadimen siduwanne shariraye thibena hithakara baktiriya warga winashawi yamaya.
parlimenthuwa rasa ganwamin apuru katha kiyannek.
loku nandage manamalaya aapasu giye diwa aaharayen pasuwaya.
selestron eka hondayi ganna wadiyi.
eka ekage jarawa athagana eka, sema hotu le, muthra , mala , sarawa, ekka ganudenu karana eka eka ekage kate pu* angili gahana eka eka athakin balagena giyama adahanna watina rassawak thamayi...

mahawali wyaparaye krushikarmika sanwardhanaya, ee thula athi wu rate aarthikaya shakthimath wima, widulibala uthpadanaya, karmanthawala prabodhaya saha nawodaya ee atharata thamayi gamini disanayaka amathithuma 1986 di mahawali krida ulela patangaththe.
shri lanka werala aarakshaka madhyasthanaya
nawe hiti wadi pirisakage thiranaya anuwa nawikayage biriya muhudata dammeya.
mage sitha yali unuwigena enne....
ayi ashwayo, ballo.
◀️dan rasa anuwa lunu, gammiris kudu, kali miris da gena winadi 15 – 20 k withara diyara gathiya adu wela tikak ghanakam wela mas tika hodata thambenakan uya gena lipen ba ganna.
ee gotabhaya rajapakshage nagarika sanwardhana adhikariyen labadun wyapruthi harahayi.
eeta hethuwa yuddhaye di shel praharayekin berimata duwaddi ange inga pedesata shel kallak wadima yi.
ithin dahasak wada athare mama postuwak kotanna gaththa podi barapathala mathrukawak gana...
ehema thiranaya karanna kisima sadharana hethuwak penenna na.
oyita wada kochchara bayeda api 88/89ye hitiye....

eeta passe aya age mithuriyata sidda una abaddiya kiyanna patan gaththe harima winoden.me kisi deyak gana mage awadhanayak thibune na.ee weddi mage hada gasma wegawath wenna patan gena thibuna.kawadawath nodanuna hagimakin hitha pirila giya.honda husmak gaththa mama aya dihawata haruna.aya thawamath hinawemin ara siddhiya wisthara karanawa.ee hinawata badha karanna mata duka hithuna.
matath ee kale hithuna dewal samaharak mehi liyawila thiyanawa.
"ahasin watena ek diya binduwakwath minisage prayojanayata nogena muhudata ek wimata ida nodiya yuthuya " yana bhashanaya ohuge janapriya kiyaman athurin ekaki.[3]
+ hari hari yanawa yanawa layin eke innama mama ..duwala yanawa issarahata maha loku chandi..
mehi nawathama sanskaranaya pera dita wada apurwathwayak eyata ek kara athi atharama lankika apatath eyin laba gatha haki prayojana wishalayi.
saudi rajaya gath ema mathabhedakari thiranaya me wanawita boho denekuge wiwechanayata bandun wi athi bawakda peni yayi.
hugak jiwitha awul wenne me aathmiya badima nisi aakarawa athiwune nathi wunama.

kelam kiyana wachane ahuna gaman hithata enne ahalepola pawulata kelam nisa una de.eda ee ahalepola pawula wijathikayinta gathi kelam karayek athin winashawuna.ada ee widiyatama ehema wijathika sambhawayak thiyana oya athin mageyi kellageyi jiwitha makara katak lagatama genawa.wenasak na.

sinhala-thamil-muslim bhedayakin thorawa siyalu janaya me nawa libaral dhanawadi samaja ratawa thula wisandum nathi prashna samudayaka patali, jiwana arbudayaka goduru bawata pathwa, siya jathika sanskruthinge anagatha pawathma pilibanda bhithiyakin musapath wi siti.
''parana blok nadda atawaganda puluwan ekak''
apo hada unata kisi sap ekak na.
eeth mata me widiya goadak watinawa.
margaya wana wita, nuthana namaya "roma" lesa pariwarthanaya kara atha.
shalyakarma deka thunakatamath punchi kale muhuna denna siduwuna.
gowinta awash ya piliganima, gowithanata awash ya bija.
jalaya gena yana wishala nalayakin ringa gal biththi asalin ihalata adiya yuththe pahalata wiwarawu hela aashritha pas bami kada yana nisa awadanamini.
siduwim ee satiyen ma pawasannata nam wiwahaya ha sambandha katha karanu labana wadagath kathabas saha mahar ganudenu wani de ema sakshi karuwange idiripita ma siduwiya yuthu ya.
dan mata raththaran mala dana eka ape gedara ekkena sampurnenma thahanam kala.
male widiye thiyena aarakshaka pasala kurunagala thiyena aarakshaka pasala mewa itha amaruwen hithala karapu wyapruthi.
manasa athi wima sambandhayen sinhala bauddha manasa yana lipiya, kalaya web adawiyen labagena kiyawiya haki ya.
ohu thaman mathdrawya dan bhawitha nokarana bawa tharaye kiwada ohuge muthra wala koken sanghataka hamuwi thibe.
brasila deshapalana wicharakayaku wana anthani pereyira kiyanne, kaptan jeyi siya adahas mese nirbhayawa prakasha karanuye rate thawamath prajathanthrawadi watapitawak thibena nisa wagayi.
aanduwa kamkaruwange ha duginge jiwana, samaja ha pa්rajathantha්rawadi ayithinta pahara ella karanneda me pa්racharayanta muwawi genaya.
dan ithin oogollanta therenawa athine meka supiri nirmanayak wenna oona waga.

mema samajikayin pasugiya desathiya mululle shri lanka nawika hamuda saha thawath deshiya wruththikayin samaga ekwa siwil injineru, manushiya sahana saha aapada sahana salasime wadasatahan rashiyak sandaha siya dayakathwaya sapayana ladi.
niwase siti mahalu mawak ha tharuna gabini kanthawakuyi melesa niwasa thuladima thiyunu aayudhawalin kapa kota mara dama aththe.
ee nisa thamayi wisheshayen me kamituwa path kale.
katawath sudulunu podi kirimata mata awashyathawayak natha.
ti.ti.ee ya winasha kala yuthu yayi me ugaththu pawasuha.dan ee badhawa iwath kara atha.

enamudu aa wathurata itha akamaththak dakwana bawa mama mehi sandahan karanne itha sanwegayeni.aa dina kiyak nam "nana kamaraye dama dora wasa athdayi" age ayiyalagen asiya yuthuya.nana kamaraye dama pitathin agulu lawada me wira kanthawa ee kisi deneka diya na nothibu bawa mama danimi.ee age hatiya.aa nanne aata oona dinakaya.
minissu wiwidha hethu nisa yuddha karaganithi.
nirmali tichar api ena manga balagena hitiya.
windithayan ha sakshikaruwan aaraksha kirima wenuwen shri lankawa wisin pihituwa athi adhikariyata path kara thibena sabhapathiwaraya athulu niladharin thun denaku iwath karana...
“manawe musala katha kiyanna epa.
klanthaya athi wime roga lakashana, nimithi saha prathikara
kridaka kridikawan hambawela kathabaha karanakota apata therenawa ape dayakathwaye pragathiyak thiyenawa kiyala.
silawathuren godabimata aa thrasthawadinge gini awi!
habayi me lipiya pot eka liyapu kenath dannawa peneda rahasa?

sawudi arabiye kriyathmaka wanne wahabi wadaya.

ohu ge dath depelehi pihitimath ingirisi uchcharanayen lath aabhasayath nisa a, o wani swara shabdath cha, ja, sa, tha, da wani wyanyjana shabdath ohuta uchcharanaya wuye ingirisi bhashakayakuta meni.

kisima hethuwak nathi maranayak..
eya soya dimata owun apohosath wuwa hoth ee sandaha wandiyak owun gewawi.
andum andina piliwelakuth thiyenawa.
pohottuwe kumara welgama wani nayakayin ada elipita ee gana prashna karanne me nisa thamayi.
ohuge dewani biriya wuye sadanandawathiyi.
mata mathakayi yudde yana kale asanipa wu daya mastar ho wena el el ti ti lokkekuge birindakagenuth oya prashnema ahuwa.
sabhawa atharamada sangrahayak widihata hamomata kanna thibba madan,himbautu,ambaa eka gediyakatawak ganu neweyi hota gahuwe.
winayak athi paripalanayak rate bihi kala yuthu bawa janapathi...
oowa gana katha karanna rate loke ugath buddimath minissu innawa.
gunasekara, denis pranandu ha gamini gunawardhana yana mahathwaruda ekwa sitiyaha.

siya jiwithayata aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwen tharjana ella wi athi bawin eki tharjana lithawa idiripath kirimata awasara laba dena lesa ema pudgalaya eeye (23 da) perawaruwe withthi kuduwe sita kotuwa mahesthrath lanka jayarathna menawiya gen illa sitiyeya.

‘aayish amma gundu’ ‘sakisanda mandala’ jud nirmanaya kala wedika nirmana we...galkisse shantha anthoni romanu katholika pasalen adhyapanaya hadala jud kalawata paminenne siya piya wu klarans gomas mahathage manga penwima osse ya.

wahana pahasukam ho marga pahasukam nomathi yugayaka dambaawinna wiharaye himiwarunta aagamika katayuthu sandaha malpotha gamata yamada asiru karunak bawata pathwa thibenawa. 1910 di pamana mema gataluwa wisanda ganimata mehi jiwathwu pinwantha upasaka mahatheku thamanta ayath idame katumatiyen idikala piduru sewili kala aawasa geyak idikara thibenawa.
aniyam sabandatha athiwanne.
pasal wishala sankhyawak owun bomba dama winasha kara damme apage uෙdyagimath samanathwaye hangim janathawa atharata gena yana margaya eya nisayi.
2004 di katharagama wandanawe pamini atham piris da katharagama wandanawe pamina muhuda bada pradesha osse siya gam bim wetha gaman kala atham piris da sunami wyasanayata lakwa miya giyaha.

ane me gamana nogos nathara wenna yayi amma kiwa noweda..?
sthuthiyi hiru, jaya wewa ...!
meya rateiි deshamamaka janathawage jayaguuhanayaki.
eheth eyata eeniya aagamika muhunuwarak dennata uthsaha nogena sitinawa nam wadath sudusuyi.
loka bankuwe shri lanka shakhawa wisin ganu labana thirana awasana thirana we.
mama me pariwarthanaya kale ehema nathiwa.
umbaa othanin hal seru deka hamarak aran lipe thiyahan.
lankawata mulin ma jangama durakathana handunwa dun seltel samagamath mugdha lesa thamange nama kipa wathawak wenas kala.

agaya ekathu kirima matha kurundu, gammiris athulu pradhana wawili magin ihala apanayana aadayamak ipayimata salasum karannayi mama upades dunnemi.
maharaja sapathniroshaya nam deyek atha.

wishwawidyalayanta athulwimata sudusukam labana 150,000 k pamana wana usas pela sisun atharin 25,000k tharam sankhyawak pamanak athulwimata waram labana thaththwayak yatathe sesu pirisata owunge usas adhyapanaya sandaha athi awasthawa ahimi kere.

onna 200ta magenuth ehenam subha pathum,
un aagiya thorathuru kiyawa kiyawa innawaya.,....
enna ennama minisunge paramayusha wadiwela thiyena bawayi sathyaya.
eka nisa rata nawaththala udeta balanna purudu wenna..

unta patta padiyakne gewanne.
me athara siya nayakayage miyayama wenuwen paliganna bawata islamiya jihad sanwidhanaya anathuru agawimak da sidu kara atha.
boltsman praweshayata ergodin hayipothisisge kalpithayada wadagath we.
as wattuwa ibbanwela handiya aadi nam wanijakaranayata da adu wadi washayen hasuwemin beri beri pawathi.
ee mathakaya awadi kirimak thamayi me karanne.

mema chodana athara rajaye depola, mudal, wahana, godanagili waradi parihanayata yoda ganima, miladi ganima, hithawathunta dima waradana, chanda samaye godanagili bhanda, silredi, lith bedima, raththaran ashwayan, sukhopabhogi wahana, hora banku ginum, wides mudal pilibanda chodana we.
papadi kridawa kiyanne kapawima, sawibalaya saha daraganime shakthiya kiyana karana thune ekathuwak.
palamu loka yuddhaya pupura giya 1914 saha sowiyat sangamaya wisuruwa hala 1991 athara pawathiye, nomaga yawunu “anthayange yugaya” yi.
mokakda dannawada une?
koheda dan meke sindu dawunlod karana wade wenneth na ne.
math ithin ee dawas wala hamadama baskatbol saha badmintan praktis iwara wela gedara enne hawas wela nisa anga patha hodala kala bila iskole wada patan ganne atata withara.

oya polgasime prathipala.

owun thamayi mage lokaya.
nadu wibhagaya juli masa 21 wanida yali kadawimata niyamithaya.
wahi baliyata kalin karapu balith thibila thinawa.

apata ee danuma prathyakshayen danuma labagath srushiwarun gen labini.
“kasanda bandala na..?
na eewa passe kaledi karana eewa nisa kalabala kara ganta epa.
thawada mese karunu manasata athulath kirimata pera sankethawath kirimak siduwe.
owunta denulabu niyoga elesinma itu karamin sitinnoya”.
ithi kellageth kamaththa pita eeka karala denawa.
sakakaru nawalapitiya pradeshaye padinchi wayasa awurudu 35ka pudgalayek.
eeken penne soldaduwo inne siwil janathawa raka ganna neweyi, aandu paksha deshapalagnyayanwayi unge katu lewakana ballanwayi aaraksha karanna.
manawa himikam komasaris 6 wenida lankawata ! (190)
namuth ape wat rahasa une eeka neweyi.
mata fon ekak ganda balanda oone ban..."

eelanga kotasa witharamayi thiyenne....

pasugiya pahawasara shishyathwa wibhagayen lakunu 196k laba diwayine 2 wani sthanayata pathwu godagama subharathi mahamathya widyalaye igenuma labana kawindya gimhani dariyata da idiri adhyapana katayuthu sandaha rupiyal panasdahasaka mudalak labaduni.waidya aadhara washayen daru dedenakuta daruwakuta rupiyal eklaksha wisidahasaka mudalak saha thawath daruwakuta rupiyal laksha dekakata wadi mudalak da laba denu labini.me shishyathwa aadhara labimata aabadhitha, miyagiya saha danata sewaye niyuthuwa sitina ranawiru pawulwala palamu shreniye sita 13 wasara dakwa adhyapanaya karana daruwan himikam labu athara kridawata daksha daruwakuta indiyawata yamata eemata guwan tikatpathe mudal da himiwiya.shri lanka yuda hamudawe sesu balaka sewawanitha eekakawala sabhapathiniyan, ranawiru mawupiyan athulu wishala pirisak mema awasthawata sahabhagi wuha..
